  • Method Details

    • addComponent

      public static void addComponent(Object component, boolean asCache)
      Adds a component to the current container instance.

      If the component already exists in the container, this method logs a message and skips further action. Otherwise, the component is added with optional caching.

      Parameters:
      component - the component to add
      asCache - whether the component should be cached

    • getHandler

      @CheckForNull public static AbstractCoreHandler getHandler(TestType type)
      Retrieves a test handler of the specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - the type of test handler to retrieve
      Returns:
      the AbstractCoreHandler matching the specified type, or null if none is found
